nodes.text: Dantari crystals were a type of kyber crystal found on the Outer Rim planet of Dantooine. When Dantooine still housed a prominent Jedi Temple, the multihued Dantari crystal were extremely popular among the Jedi seeking to build a lightsaber. Some Jedi found such crystals within the eggs of the cave-dwelling kinrath, although how they wound up there remained a mystery.
